questions: Which country  will hold the next World Cup?   _
article: David Beckham, a well-known football player, was born in London on May 2nd, 1975. He is about 1.8 metres tall. He is very strong and big. He is very quite a good football player. He scored a lot of goals for his old team---- the National Football Team of England  . He joined the Real Madrid   after he left  his old team. He wants to play football in Pairs in the next World Cup.
